# RAPS - Rust Autodesk Platform Services CLI

> RAPS is a comprehensive command-line interface for Autodesk Platform Services (APS), designed for high-performance CI/CD pipelines and AI agents. Written in Rust, it provides fast, reliable access to all major APS APIs.

RAPS (rapscli.xyz) brings modern DevOps practices to Autodesk Platform Services. It's a single-binary CLI tool with no runtime dependencies, supporting 15+ APS APIs and 100+ commands. Key features include MCP server integration for AI assistants, interactive shell mode, secure OS keychain token storage, and CI/CD-ready output formats.

## Documentation

- [Introduction](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/introduction): Overview of RAPS capabilities and architecture
- [Installation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/installation): Install via Cargo, Homebrew, Scoop, Docker, or direct download
- [Configuration](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/configuration): Set up APS credentials via environment variables or config profiles
- [Authentication](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/auth): 2-legged OAuth, 3-legged OAuth, device code flow, and token management
- [Quick Start](https://rapscli.xyz/quickstart): Step-by-step guide to get running in minutes
- [Architecture](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/architecture): Microkernel architecture with workspace crates

## Core Features

- [Buckets (OSS)](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/buckets): Create, list, and manage Object Storage Service buckets
- [Objects (OSS)](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/objects): Upload, download, and manage objects with resumable multipart uploads
- [Translation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/translation): Translate CAD files to SVF2, OBJ, STL, STEP, and other formats
- [Data Management](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/data-management): Browse hubs, projects, folders, items, and versions
- [MCP Server](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/mcp-server): AI assistant integration via Model Context Protocol (14+ tools)
- [Interactive Shell](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/interactive-shell): TAB completion, command history, and REPL mode
- [Pipelines](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/pipelines): CI/CD integration with standardized exit codes
- [Exit Codes](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/exit-codes): Scripting-friendly exit codes for automation
- [Troubleshooting](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/troubleshooting): Common issues and solutions

## Cookbooks & Recipes

### AEC (Architecture, Engineering, Construction)
- [ACC Navigation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-navigation): Browse Autodesk Construction Cloud projects
- [ACC Documents](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-documents): Document management in ACC
- [ACC Issues](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-issues): Issue tracking workflows
- [ACC Checklists](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-checklists): Quality checklist automation
- [ACC Daily Log](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-dailylog): Daily log entries
- [ACC Quality](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-quality): Quality management workflows
- [ACC Reporting](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-reporting): Generate reports from ACC data
- [ACC Submittals](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-acc-submittals): Submittal package workflows
- [AEC Coordination](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-coordination): Model coordination workflows
- [AEC IFC](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-ifc): IFC import/export workflows
- [AEC Metadata](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-metadata): Extract and manage BIM metadata
- [AEC Rooms](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-rooms): Room and space data extraction
- [AEC Versioning](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-versioning): Version control for design files
- [AEC ACC Sync](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-aec-acc-sync): Sync workflows with ACC

### Manufacturing
- [MFG Batch Processing](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-batch): Batch file operations
- [MFG Bill of Materials](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-bom): BOM extraction and management
- [MFG Catalog](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-catalog): Part catalog workflows
- [MFG Drawings](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-drawings): Drawing generation and export
- [MFG Iterations](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-iterations): Design iteration tracking
- [MFG Supplier](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-supplier): Supplier collaboration workflows
- [MFG Translation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-mfg-translation): CAD format conversions

### Media & Entertainment
- [Media Animation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-animation): Animation file workflows
- [Media Catalog](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-catalog): Asset catalog management
- [Media Materials](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-materials): Material library workflows
- [Media Photogrammetry](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-photogrammetry): Reality capture workflows
- [Media Review](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-review): Review and approval processes
- [Media Site Capture](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-sitecapture): Site scanning workflows
- [Media Translation](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-translation): Media format conversions
- [Media Versioning](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/cookbook-media-versioning): Asset version control

## Interactive Tools

- [OAuth Scope Builder](https://rapscli.xyz/tools/scope-builder): Build and validate APS OAuth scope combinations
- [JWT Token Decoder](https://rapscli.xyz/tools/token-decoder): Decode and analyze APS authentication tokens
- [Token Cost Estimator](https://rapscli.xyz/tools/token-estimator): Estimate API costs
- [Translation Debugger](https://rapscli.xyz/tools/translation-debugger): Debug Model Derivative translations
- [URN Encoder/Decoder](https://rapscli.xyz/tools/urn-encoder): Encode and decode APS URNs

## Resources

- [APS Cheat Sheet](https://rapscli.xyz/resources/aps-cheatsheet): Complete single-page reference for APS development
- [API Decision Tree](https://rapscli.xyz/resources/api-decision-tree): Interactive guide to choose the right APS APIs
- [Examples](https://rapscli.xyz/docs/examples): Common workflow examples with code

## Additional Information

- [About](https://rapscli.xyz/about): Project background and author information
- [Roadmap](https://rapscli.xyz/roadmap): Planned features and development timeline
- [Changelog](https://rapscli.xyz/changelog): Version history and release notes
- [API Coverage](https://rapscli.xyz/api-coverage): Supported APS APIs and endpoints
- [Blog](https://rapscli.xyz/blog): Articles on CI/CD for APS and automation tutorials

## Quick Start

```bash
# Install via Cargo
cargo install raps

# Configure credentials
export APS_CLIENT_ID="your_client_id"
export APS_CLIENT_SECRET="your_client_secret"

# Test authentication
raps auth test

# List buckets
raps bucket list

# Upload and translate a model
raps dm upload ./model.dwg --translate --formats svf2
```
